Joke of the Day from the RHF Archives

Twice a day we add a new joke to this window onto the RHF archives, in the approximate order in which they were originally posted. Come here from time to time to get new jokes from the archives. We keep them around for about a week. The most recent joke is at the top.

This page changes every day so you may wish to bookmark it. You may also need to click "Reload" on your browser to refresh it.

You can also simply browse the archives directly.

Be sure to also visit the Current RHF Jokes page, updated whenever a new joke is posted to rec.humor.funny. Or read the newsgroup with your newsreader or web browser.

This page brought to you by Sports Tickets
